name: Watching the Lava Lamp Facility
description:
Game:

You work at Lava Lamps Inc. However, recently the computer systems have been infected with a the computer virus CCA, so the systems will break constantly. In order to tell which system has broken, you will have to check the lights of the CCMS. You can pull up a paper to see which changes signal which issues. In order to fix issues, go to the computer room, then select the correct issue to fix. If you select the wrong one, the computer will be temporally locked. If you don't fix an issue in time, you will lose the game. Survive for six minutes to win.

Credits:

A.J.: Programming. Art, Sound Effects.

Shawn: Music, Sound Effects.

The font is Film Cryptic and made by GemFonts.
